```{r}
set.seed(1)
x <- rnorm(100)
y <- 2 * x + rnorm(100)
```

11a)

```{r}
summary(lm.noInt)
```


12a) If the points are symmetrical on the line y=x, the coefficient estimate stays the same for each of them.

12b)
```{r}
x1 = rnorm(100)
y1 = rnorm(100)
plot(x1,y1)
summary(lm(y1~x1))
summary(lm(x1~y1))
```

12c)
```{r}
c1 = rnorm(50)
c2 = rnorm(50)
x2 = c(c1,c2)
y2 = c(c2,c1)
plot(x2,y2)
summary(lm(y2~x2))
summary(lm(x2~y2))
```
